author: PlayStation
description:
Death is inevitable.

From the creators of Halo and Destiny comes Marathon, a team-based extraction shooter. Choose your Runner and scavenge the lost colony of Tau Ceti IV for fortune, power, and answers to Tau Ceti's secrets.

Coming September 23, 2025.

Written and Directed by Alberto Mielgo
Produced by Sergio Jimenez
Co-Produced by Bungie
Made by Pinkman.TV, Agora, Illusorium
 
VO Cast
Erica Lindbeck - Glitch
Elias Toufexis - Void
Nika Futterman - Blackbird
Donnla Hughes - ONI
Ben Starr - Narrator

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Marathon - Reveal Cinematic Short | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/UP0006-PPSA24662_00-F12025PS5GAME000

F1 25: Out May 30. Play 3 days early from May 27 with the Iconic Edition, featuring exclusive Lewis Hamilton content and much more. Pre-order here 👉 https://www.ea.com/games/f1/f1-25/buy

In this Deep Dive video, we break down all of the new features and improvements coming to F1 25’s Career Modes: My Team & Driver Career.

0:00 - What’s new in My Team & Driver Career?
0:14 - Team Management in My Team
0:59 - Research & Development in My Team
1:42 - Driver Contracts in My Team
2:07 - Personnel & Workforce in My Team
2:28 - Manage your Finances in My Team
2:51 - Race as Both Drivers in My Team
3:21 - Team HQ Upgrades in My Team
3:57 - Accolades & Fan Ratings in My Team
4:34 - Driver Icons in My Team
5:05 - Race as Konnersport or APXGP in My Team
5:35 - Race as Konnersport or APXGP in Driver Career

#ps5 #ps5games #F125 #EAF1 #EASPORTSF1
title: F1 25 - My Team & Driver Career Deep Dive | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
His benevolence, Mirage, has presented our feeble vestiges with gifts from the Outlands. Earn his favor by playing the new 3rd-person mode EPG Extreme where Legends battle it out with Power Swords and EPG-1s. Praise his splendor by completing Creator Commissioner Challenges and ascending the reward track. Finally, don his glory with combat-themed cosmetics to earn Mirage's Prestige skin—his final form, a most perfect embodiment...of his body.


Apex Legends™ is a free-to-play* battle royale game where legendary characters battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier. Play for free now on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation 5.

Credits:
Production Company: Electronic Arts & Dark Burn Creative
Sound Design and Mix: Respawn Entertainment & Mass Audio
All other categories: Electronic Arts & Respawn Entertainment

*Applicable platform account and platform subscription (sold separately) may be required. Persistent internet connection and EA account required. Age restrictions
title: Apex Legends - Fight Force Event Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
